message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $170. This is a one-time offer, so I hope you'll consider it.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I really appreciate your enthusiasm.  However, $170 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable spending.  I'm willing to pay $140 for the product. Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer of $140. I appreciate your honesty, but I was really hoping to get closer to my target price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $160. This is a fair compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product. Let me know what you think.

Alice, I appreciate you trying to meet me halfway, but $160 is still a bit higher than my budget allows.  I'm willing to go up to $150. If you're not able to come down to that price, I'm going to have to explore other options.
